name: Vacation Sports
overview: Vacation Sports brings the exhilaration of sports competition to your home! Players stay at a 5-star resort and enjoy a variety of their favorite classic sports, such as go-carts, dodgeball, darts, frisbee golf and and more, while also picking up other global sports played by millions around the world. Features GO KARTS - Use your Wii Remote to throw, swing, dodge, block, bowl, race, and so much more! DARTS - Win trophies, rewards, and new unlockable mini-games to play! DISC GOLF - Practice your skills in quick play mode... DODGE BALL - ...Then go head-to-head with up to four friends in sports challenge mode! Plus many more favorites...
